moves.1. e4: Hi everyone, I'm annotating a recent game that I really enjoyed. A short game, it demonstrates the importance of well positioned pieces and how they can work together beautifully.  This is my first annotation, feel free to leave a comment..
moves.1... e5: Standard textbook, OK with me as I like to have many options available from this position.
moves.2. Nf3: Bringing the faithful king's knight out...
moves.2... d6: Defending his e pawn, opening for the bishop.
moves.3. Nc3: Theres no rush to castle and I like bringing the knights out early..
moves.3... h6: Not sure about this move..? I think development would have been more beneficial...
moves.4. Bc4: Looking for a sound position on the board.
moves.4... c6: Probably hoping for attack to gain d5 but what about development?
moves.6... Qe7: Bringing the queen out early...later proves to be a mistake
moves.7. dxe5 dxe5: My queen patiently waits for her opportunity ...
moves.9. b3 Qf6: Opening for the bish,  but dangerous for Her Majesty ...
moves.10. Bb2 Be7: Getting ready to castle.. I have other ideas...
moves.11... Bg4: I was waiting for ... Bg4 but now it is too late!
moves.12. Bxe5: The warzone is now open for battle!
moves.12... Qg6: The only safe place for royalty ...
moves.13... Qxe4: As predicted the queen is forced to flee here
moves.14. Re1: Its quite interesting how all the pieces work harmoniously together ...
moves.14... Qf5: Again I have control over the queen, she must retreat
moves.15. Bxg7: Preventing castling, attacking the rook and dominating ranks d and e... I had a lot of fun in this game
moves.15... Rg8: Protecting the rook but I haven't finished yet...
moves.16. Qd6: Threatening mate at e7 and bishop is pinned by my rook!
moves.16... Qd7: Only the queen can save the game. Hoping for an exchange but why would I want to stop now?!
moves.17. Bxf7+: If the king takes it's gameover...
moves.17... Kd8 18. Qxh6:
And there you have it! Black resigns as although I'm only 2+ in material so far, the outcome is in my favour due to positioning and inevitable gain for me. I really enjoyed this game thankyou branneke ( I like your puzzles too!). To everyone else I hope you enjoyed the game as much as I did!!
Cheers,
Bianca
